Subject: To be honest, . . .

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 584

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Frankly, I'm almost out of topics to discuss in this room.  Either we 
take up discussion about a tournament and its rules, about possible 
features for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom, or about starting 'The 50 
Project', or this discussion board goes dead again.

I expected between talk about working on new scenarios as a group and 
working on a tournament to have some messages being posted today.  Oh 
well.

I would say that I am thinking about plans for a 2nd gladiator 
tournament, but those plans depend on some success and learning from 
mistakes from a 1st gladiator tournament.
